snippet: After more than a week of condemnation, the Israeli prime minister issued a statement retracting his accusation that a Palestinian cleric had given Hitler the idea of annihilating Jews.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu retracts statement in which he accused Palestinian cleric Haj Amin al-Husseini of giving Hitler idea of massacring European Jews, after more than week of criticism, both at home and abroad, over statement.
lead_paragraph: After more than a week of condemnation, the Israeli prime minister issued a statement retracting his accusation that a Palestinian cleric had given Hitler the idea of annihilating Jews.

headline.main: Netanyahu Retracts Assertion That Palestinian Inspired Holocaust
